ngiemboon: Tsɔ̌ tâshÿɔ́ʼ ndɔɔn gẅie pege yé ńgwɔ́, à pyě tsetsɛ̀ɛ láʼ.
en: A short, thin man who was with me got lost in the crowd.

ngiemboon: Ngwɔ́ mé le lwo ńgyá mmó tàʼ feláŋ á metʉ̌a wɔ́.
en: At the market, you cannot easily see goods for one franc.

ngiemboon: Tà mé pfó tàʼ sàga nzsè.
en: Let's not take the long way.

ngiemboon: Pi yé mépʉ́a fóo légɔɔn tàʼa mmó.
en: You two just said the same thing.

ngiemboon: Ɔ̀ lɔɔn ńgwɔ́ tekùʼ te gɔɔn ngie ɔ̀ kuʼ.
en: If you're incapable, don't say you're enough.

ngiemboon: Múɔ kaa fàʼ faʼa, à těen nge ńjÿó mmó wɔ́.
en: The child has not worked, he will not eat.
